author: Nevada Alde
title: Slashing the stigma: Victoria-based director to release menopause documentary
text:
Victoria-based director Kate Green has recently completed a groundbreaking project on bringing awareness to the natural (and often overlooked) cycle, menopause.
The documentary is an empowering and hopeful look at menopause for all that are going through it, will go through it, or wish to support someone during.
Directed and produced by Green, Menopause: Coming in Hot, aims at breaking down barriers and stigma surrounding menopause and how it impacts women worldwide.
Considering over one billion women across the globe are postmenopausal and new women are facing this new stage each day, Green wanted to redefine it as an empowering transition while acknowledging its challenges.
In an interview with Green, she said it was inspired by her own experience navigating peri-menopausal symptoms, and she hopes to shift how other people approach it as well.
“It’s been a really eye-opening process,” Green laughed.
“Knowing and learning about my own personal symptoms and sharing them with the world has been a very vulnerable experience, and getting insight from the many experts we interviewed has been so valuable.”
Green added that one in two women feel completely unprepared for this stage in their lives, especially as they reach the peak in their careers and are looking to level up, only to get hit with a new phase without much straightforward help and solutions.
It underlines the gap that needs to be filled in this area of healthcare, especially when you look at the hit on the workforce
“There’s $237 million dollars lost in productivity every year in Canada, so when a third of your workforce is going through this, you would think that [businesses] would try to fill this gap,” she said.
“There’s a lot of work that needs to be done.”
Green also said in addition to businesses needing to come up with better supports for women, the lack of education can, unfortunately, be traced back to the lack of information provided to doctors as they go through training.
“Doctors are given an hour or maybe two hours of menopause training, or not at all. UBC just announced that they’ll be adding menopause information to their curriculum, so that’s a step forward.”
So, while it may not be the doctors fault if they’re unsure what to do or say if a woman comes to them for menopause symptoms, Green said that it’s shocking that this level of uncertainty hasn’t been corrected by adding it to more curricula.
This information came from some of the medical experts Green interviewed, including Dr. Lori Brotto, a Canadian psychologist who is a renowned figure in the field of women’s sexual health; and Dr. Whitney Wood, who discussed the history of women’s health.
Some of the groups that stood out, and are a recommended resource for community and shared experience include the women at the Menopause Foundation of Canada and Shirley Weir’s support website called “Menopause Chicks.”
Green said that as humans continue to live longer lifespans, it’s important to know what’s needed to protect joint and muscle health as we age, and part of that is understanding menopause and how it changes the body.
“There’s so much more that we have to do preventatively now [that] we’re living four or five more decades after we turn 50.”
Green laughed and said that it’s amazing how much the conversation has changed even within the last few years, adding that maybe it’s because of the Gen X’ers like herself that no longer want to just sweep these issues under the rug.
“It wasn’t even called ‘menopause,’ it was just called ‘the change.’”
“I do think the education in this has to start with women at a younger age, it goes back to the idea of preventative healthcare and medicine.”
She highlighted this adds a sense of urgency to the topic, which was also part of the motivation to get this documentary out there.
When asked what her hope is for the documentary, she said the main one is to make an impact and remind women that life and beauty isn’t over the second menopause hits—that there are many incredible years left and you’re not alone in this experience.
“Women that I talk to that have gone through it and are on the other side, say that it’s the best years of their life. They give—excuse my language—zero f***s…they are free and have all this knowledge and maturity and experience, and are still young.”
She believes there will be pieces that anyone can resonate with, as everyone probably has an individual either going through menopause or will eventually.
In terms of any advice Green has for anyone going through menopause, she says to talk to your doctor, find a community and be open about it.
“The more we talk about it, the better off the next generation will be.”
Greenlit by TELUS originals, this feature documentary was directed and produced by Green, and co-produced by Amber Orchard. Also on the production team included Olivia Fellows and Jessica Young of Young Fellows Pictures.
The film’s cast and crew was approximately 90% women, giving the show an authenticity in its approach and execution.
“Our camera crew was all female…and our post-production was all women…in the film industry women have been fighting for change, and the change has started to happen,” Green said.
“This only happened because women kept talking, kept fighting for equality, and that’s the hope I have for menopause. By doing that, you fight the stigma, and then it just becomes a normal part of our society and is not taboo.”
The film’s release will depend on festival appearances, so stay tuned on Green’s website for dates!

author: Luca Uccello
title: Il Paradiso delle Signore, Gloria Radulescu: «Marta torna per riprendersi il suo Vittorio...»
text:
Gloria Radulescu torna a Il Paradiso delle Signore . Ci torna per riprendersi Alessandro Tersigni. Un ritorno che farà piacere a tutti gli amanti della soap opera del pomeriggio di Raiuno. Un ritorno, quello di Marta Guarnieri che svonvlgerà la vita di tutta la sua famiglia e quella dell’ex marito Vittorio Conti. L'attrice che interpreta Marta e che il 15 dicembre è tornata sul set del Grande Magazzino più amato dopo due anni di assenza. «È stata una grande emozione tornare nella soap e ritrovare i miei compagni di viaggio», ha confidato Gloria a Nuovo Tv.
Per chi se lo fosse dimenticato Marta era fuggita negli Stati Uniti dopo aver scoperto di non poter avere figli e quindi di non poter costruire una famiglia con il suo amato marito Vittorio Conti (Alessandro Tersigni). Poi però in America succede qualcosa che la spinge. a tornare in Italia.
Un ritorno che farà rumore: Marta ha riabbracciato il padre Umberto Guarnieri (Roberto Farnesi), e ha ritrovato il suo ex marito Vittorio, che però ora è innamorato di un’altra donna, Matilde Frigerio di Sant’Erasmo (Chiara Baschetti). La Radulescu rivela che però «a un certo punto Marta si renderà conto che in fondo al suo cuore nutre ancora un forte sentimento per Vittorio. Chissà se anche lui avvertirà le stesse emozioni! È un bel mistero, tutto da scoprire a partire dal 1° gennaio, quando torniamo in onda».
Intanto in questi due anni Gloria ha viaggiato molto ma ha soprattutto «scritto il mio primo lungometraggio, che ho già inviato al ministero della Cultura, per cui incrocio le dita. Mi sono dedicata allo yoga e al benessere psico-!sico e ho aperto una pagina spirituale sui social, che si chiama Vai Oltre».

author: Rachel Lourdesamy
title: Circle Shares Slide Despite Strong Earnings as USDC Growth Falls Short
text:
Circle Shares Slide Despite Strong Earnings as USDC Growth Falls Short
- Following its latest earnings report, Circle shares dropped more than 6% even as USDC circulation rose 90% to US$61.3 billion (AU$93.9 billion).
- Analysts highlighted slower USDC growth, rising distribution costs, and broader macroeconomic pressures as key factors affecting performance.
- Mizuho lowered its price target to US$84 (AU$128.8), citing concerns over margin compression and elevated stock valuation.
cCircle Internet Group shares fell by more than 6% following the company’s latest quarterly earnings report, despite posting strong results. The amount of USDC in circulation rose 90% year-over-year to US$61.3 billion (AU$93.9 billion), while total revenue and reserve income climbed 53% to US$658 million (AU$1.01 billion).
Analysts at Mizuho Securities suggested that the stock’s decline was partly due to slower-than-expected growth.
Circle had projected USDC to achieve a 40% compound annual growth rate, but quarterly growth of just 6% fell short of these targets. They also highlighted that distribution costs have risen from 39% of the reserve pool in 2022 to 64% in the second quarter of 2025, which has reduced margins.
Analysts additionally noted that broader macroeconomic trends were affecting investor sentiment. A slower rise in US consumer prices – reported at 2.7% year-over-year in July – has raised expectations of potential interest rate cuts, which could negatively affect Circle, given its reliance on higher rates for revenue generation.
Mizuho Cuts Stock Target
Mizuho lowered its price target from US$85 (AU$130.2) to US$84 (AU$128.8), maintaining an Underperform rating, reflecting concerns about margin compression and slower-than-anticipated USDC growth. Circle’s shares are currently trading at around US$100 (AU$153.2), giving the company a market capitalisation of US$41.1 billion (AU$62.9 billion).
Mizuho senior analyst Dan Dolev commented that Circle’s post-IPO valuation appeared high relative to actual USDC adoption. He highlighted that while US policy changes have eased the use of stablecoins, real-world adoption of USDC has not met expectations.
Despite its strong quarterly performance, Circle’s combination of slower growth, rising costs, and high valuation has created pressure on its shares, leaving analysts cautious about near-term performance.
Related: Circle Seeks to Open Bank to Expand into TradFi Custody Services

author: jacinto9999
title: #24 La Facultad de Ciencias de la Información de la Complutense confirma que Vito Quiles miente y no es licenciado en periodismo
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#5](c5#c-5) Es cloaquero porque miente más que habla, y lo hace para enfangar.
Y me disgusta el nombre, porque la gente que trabaja en las cloacas hace un trabajo muy digno y necesario.
#_2 Si el encargado de prensa de un político alardea de licenciatura y resulta que es mentira es un escándalo y debería dimitir de cualquier relación politica que pueda tener.
Para otro día dejamos que un señor que quiere vivir de paguitas públicas le vacile al empresario que ha montado un medio de comunicación, porque tiene cachindeíto.
Anda que no hay gente que NO termina la carrera y luego se cuelgan medallas como si la hubieran terminado.
En mi opinión, cuando es alguien muy conocido debería ser algo que se pueda consultar públicamente. Veo bien que tener un título pueda ser algo privado, que no se pueda saber si tienes X o Y titulación si no lo dices tú, pero una vez lo dices, no veo mal que se pueda consultar, sobre todo en casos como este donde la persona es muy conocida.
Es tan mentiroso que si le das un reloj y le quita las pilas, este no llegaría dar la hora correcta dos veces al día.
En realidad aunque tuviera el título (la facultad dice que no), tampoco sería periodista.
[#17](c17#c-17) A ver, que ya sabíamos que le comías los huevos a pagascal con absoluta efusividad, no hacía falta que te retratases aún más.
Qué grande el excoletas por haber retratado a toda la escoria fascista, aplastapobres y vendepatrias de este país. Todavía se sabe que escuece viendo que tienen a bastardos malpagados defendiendo lo indefendible por doquier. Son tan tiernos.
Pues hay que ser muy lerdo, negado, para no acabar la carrera de periodismo, esas carreras de pintar y colorear; Si me dijeras una carrera de ciencias, quizás.
Mira que no valer ni pa eso.
Alvise es un tentetieso para salir de Ayuso. Me dan ganas de votar cada noticia de Alvise SPAM a partir de ahora.
Además de mentiroso es que es subnormal: la figura del licenciado hace años que no existe. En todo caso sería graduado. Es más, lo pone en la banda.
Está claro que se hizo la foto de graduación con créditos pendientes y ahora va de que ha terminado la carrera.
Bueno, quizás haya acabado las asignaturas que le acababan en Mayo o Junio...
La prueba que dice la chavala resentida esta de que está matriculada con ella no me parece que signifique mucho a estas alturas del año.
Que el colegio le pida cuentas a él por decir que es Periodista sin serlo, si es que es así.
Pero no sé porque tanto revuelo, la verdad, es periodismo, ni que fuese una carrera de ciencias.
[#4](c4#c-4) bueno, pero eso también aplica a muchos de los que a día de hoy ya tienen el titulo. Incluso a muchos que llevan décadas con el titulo
[#10](c10#c-10) además, esa afirmación la dijo Pablo Iglesias sí, pero estando soltero, sin hijos, sin mercenarios de la derecha amenazando a su familia.
Como mínimo, una persona de "bien" con un mínimo de razonamiento, se daría cuenta que una afirmación así estando soltero, no se puede mantener cuando estas en pareja, o formando una familia, porque esa decisión ya no es sólo tuya.
Por lo tanto, solo un necio puede llamar hipócrita a Pablo Iglesias por no seguir viviendo en Vallecas.

author: Kitchen-Appliances
title: Restore with Precision: Kitchen Renovation Lynchburg Specialists
text:
Transform Your Space: Cooking Area Improvement Concepts
Welcome to "Change Your Room: Kitchen Renovation Concepts," where we give you with expert understandings and ideas to overhaul your cooking area into a practical and stylish haven. A well-designed kitchen area is the heart of any type of home, and our goal is to aid you achieve a space that not only reflects your personal taste yet also boosts your daily food preparation experience. Additionally, we will dig right into the tranquil vibes of a coastal sanctuary and share inventive storage space options to optimize your cooking area's performance.
Modern Minimalism
In the world of kitchen improvement, an elegant blend of simplicity and capability can be achieved with the concepts of modern minimalism. Modern minimalism is a design technique that focuses on tidy lines, uncluttered areas, and a neutral color palette. This design stresses making use of easy and streamlined products, such as stainless steel, concrete, and glass, to create a smooth and advanced appearance.
One of the key concepts of modern-day minimalism is the concept of decluttering. This includes eliminating unneeded things and arranging the area in a manner that optimizes efficiency and capability. By getting rid of excess mess, the cooking area becomes a more peaceful and relaxing setting, enabling for a more pleasurable cooking and dining experience.
Another vital facet of contemporary minimalism is making use of minimalist and streamlined home appliances and fixtures. This includes including built-in devices, such as refrigerators and stoves, that seamlessly blend right into the total style. Additionally, picking fixtures with easy styles and tidy lines includes to the general minimal visual.
When it pertains to shade, modern-day minimalism often prefers a neutral or single color design. This aids to create a sense of tranquility and serenity in the room. By making use of shades of white, grey, or off-white, the kitchen feels bright, spacious, and classic.
Rustic Appeal
To record the timeless and comfortable setting of a country cottage, rustic beauty can be included into your kitchen redesigning job. Rustic beauty is all regarding welcoming all-natural materials, warm colors, and a sense of background. One method to attain this is by utilizing reclaimed wood for your kitchen closets and kitchen counters. The flaws and personality of aged wood can include a rustic touch to your space. Match it with vintage-inspired equipment, such as functioned iron takes care of and knobs, to enhance the rustic appeal.
Another means to integrate rustic beauty into your kitchen area is through the use of natural stone. Consider installing a rock backsplash or a farmhouse-style stone sink to generate the sensation of nature. To even more boost the rustic charm, go with a troubled finish on your cabinets or furnishings. This will give them a worn and aged look, adding to the overall rustic visual.
In enhancement to products, lighting plays an essential function in developing a rustic atmosphere. Choose components with a vintage or commercial layout, such as mason jar pendant lights or wrought iron chandeliers. These will not only provide useful lighting yet likewise contribute to the rustic beauty of your kitchen.
To finish the rustic appearance, include aspects of nature right into your decor. Display fresh blossoms in mason containers, hang dried herbs or blossoms, and add woven baskets for storage space. These small information will bring the sentimental and relaxing ambiance of a country cottage right into your cooking area.
Coastal Oasis
Welcoming a feeling of tranquility and serenity, a coastal sanctuary brings a revitalizing and beach-inspired ambiance to your cooking area remodeling job. Changing your kitchen area into a coastal oasis allows you to produce a space that stimulates the peace of the sea and the breeziness of coastal living.
To accomplish this appearance, begin by including a shade palette inspired by the beachfront. Soft blues, sandy off-whites, and crisp whites are perfect for producing a seaside ambiance. Think about painting your cupboards in a light blue shade and selecting white kitchen counters to resemble the look of sun-bleached driftwood.
Integrating natural components is vital in a coastal oasis kitchen area. Use materials such as weather-beaten wood, seashells, and woven appearances to bring the outdoors in. Mount open shelves to show beach-inspired design and include woven baskets for storage.
Lighting is one more critical component in producing a seaside sanctuary. Select components with a nautical or coastline style, such as rope necklaces or shell-inspired light fixtures - kitchen
go to my blogcabinets Lynchburg. Additionally, maximize all-natural light by utilizing large curtains or opting for big home windows to allow in the sunlight
Finally, do not forget to include ending up touches that boost the coastal ambiance. Hang artwork featuring seascapes or aquatic life, and location potted plants or succulents to bring a touch of plant to the room.
Smart Storage Solutions
Carrying out efficient storage space options is necessary for optimizing room and organization in your kitchen remodel. When preparing your cooking area restoration, it is vital to take into consideration smart storage services that not only offer ample space for your kitchen fundamentals but additionally aid keep whatever arranged and easily available.
One prominent storage service is to mount pull-out pantry closets. These
read the full info herecabinets include shelves that can be taken out, allowing you to conveniently see and access all your pantry items. This removes the need to search with deep cabinets, saving you beneficial effort and time.
Another wise storage solution is to make use of vertical space. Installing high cupboards or open racks that extend all the way approximately the ceiling can aid optimize storage ability. This enables you to store much less frequently used things on the greater racks while keeping
visit the websiteeveryday essentials within simple reach.
Making use of the area under your cooking area sink is likewise essential. Installing pull-out cabinets or coordinators can aid maximize this frequently ignored area. These storage services can fit cleaning supplies, trash bins, and even frying pans and pots, maintaining your sink area neat and arranged.
Finally, think about incorporating multi-functional storage space remedies such as kitchen islands with integrated cabinets or shelves. These flexible furniture not only give extra counter room however additionally use enough storage space for pots, pans, and various other kitchen area tools.
Imaginative Lights Styles
One reliable way to enhance your cooking area remodel is by including cutting-edge lighting styles. Creative lights designs not only give practical illumination yet additionally include a touch of style and ambiance to your kitchen area room. There are different choices available to change your kitchen right into a well-lit and visually appealing location.
One preferred illumination style is the use of pendant lights. These hanging fixtures can be positioned above the kitchen area island or dining area, creating a centerpiece and including a modern-day touch to the space. Pendant lights come in a variety of materials, styles, and shades, enabling you to select the best suit for your kitchen's visual.
An additional innovative lighting design is under-cabinet illumination. This kind of illumination is mounted below the kitchen area closets, illuminating the kitchen counters and giving job lighting for food prep work. It not just boosts presence yet also adds a cozy and welcoming radiance to the kitchen area.
Track lighting is another alternative to take into consideration. It consists of multiple adjustable fixtures that can be positioned to highlight specific locations or items in the kitchen area. This kind of lights is flexible and enables for modification based upon your choices and demands.
Integrating LED strip lights is an energy-efficient and modern-day lighting remedy. These adhesive strips can be placed under closets, along the edges of the ceiling, or perhaps inside glass closets to create a subtle and modern lights result - kitchen cabinets Lynchburg. LED strip lights are available in various colors and can be dimmable, allowing you to create the best ambiance for any kind of occasion
Verdict
Finally, there are various cooking area redesigning concepts that can change your space. From contemporary minimalism to rustic beauty and seaside oasis, there are styles to fit various preferences. Furthermore, smart storage remedies and imaginative illumination styles can improve the functionality and ambiance of the kitchen area. By implementing these concepts, you can produce a lovely and reliable cooking area that meets your requirements and shows your design.
Welcome to "Change Your Room: Kitchen Renovation Ideas," where we provide you with specialist understandings and motivation to revamp your kitchen area into a trendy and functional place. A well-designed cooking area is the heart of any type of home, and our goal is to help you attain a room that not just mirrors your personal taste but additionally improves your everyday food preparation experience. Creative lights designs not just provide practical lighting but additionally add a touch of style and ambiance to your cooking area room. These hanging fixtures can be placed over the kitchen area island or dining area, creating a focal point and adding a modern-day touch to the room.In final thought, there are different kitchen area remodeling concepts that can change your room.

author: Eduardo Robles
title: Santiago Giménez inicia el año con reconocimiento por el mejor gol de diciembre
text: Santiago Giménez es el mejor futbolista mexicano en la actualidad, prueba de ello es el gran 2023 que firmó, pues salió campeón de la Eredivisie con el Feyenoord y fue máximo rompe redes del año natural con 36 goles. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [Cruz Azul presenta elegante jersey alternativo, ¿cuánto cuesta?](https://www.publimetro.com.mx/deportes/2024/01/05/cruz-azul-presenta-elegante-jersey-alternativo-para-el-clausura-2024-cuanto-cuesta/) En la presente temporada, Giménez anotó en todas las competiciones que el Feyenoord disputó, incluyendo la UEFA Champions League y la Europa League. Las buenas noticias para el atacante siguen en este inicio de año, pues recibió un nuevo reconocimiento por el mejor gol del Feyenoord en el mes de diciembre. Dicha anotación fue el 7 de diciembre, cuando de un cabezazo le dio la victoria a su equipo en tiempo de compensación, contra el Volendam. A través de redes sociales, el Feyenoord compartió el trofeo de Santi con la descripción, “El gol recibió la mayor cantidad de votos en la cuenta oficial de Instagram del Feyenoord…”. Se espera que para el 2024, el rendimiento del mexicano siga consolidándose para firmar una gran campaña y pueda fichar con un equipo top del futbol europeo.
